text: Violet berries salad Wash the fruits gently. Remove any stems and leaves. Place the fruits into the serving bowl. Mix together with enough spring or filtered water to make a salad texture. Arrange the fruits so that they appear interesting. Add the strawberry essence and the sugar syrup (if using).  Finish by sprinkling the violet flowers over the top. It is now ready to serve. Violet greens salad Prepare the greens. Wash and dry in the salad spinner. Prepare the violet flowers and leaves. Fill a bowl with cold water. Push the violets into it and gently move about. Drain and place in the salad spinner. Combine both the greens and the violets. Toss gently. Make the dressing. Combine the remaining ingredients except for the salt, pepper and sunflower seeds. Place into a jar with a lid and shake to emulsify. Add seasonings to taste.  Pour the dressing over the greens and violets. Finish with a sprinkling of sunflower seeds.
